page.title: 06My Mum's job in Newark
page.content: Mum's job is very tiring, she is a nurse and sometimes she has to get up at six o clock am. She has to have a bath, put on her uniform and she puts on a bit of make up on and she does her hair with a hot brush. At about 6.45am she says good-bye and she goes to work. Sometimes she will go on her bike or my dad will take her in the car. She has got to be at the hospital for 7am she works at Hawtonville hospital. It is not a hospital for young people who come to stay in the hospital for operations, it is for old people who are there permanently. There are a lot of visitors who come. My mum likes her work even though it is exhausting.
